oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get
options.description: Get your user's profile

options.name: Update
options.description: Update user's profile

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Channel containing the message. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
channelId.ai_hint: Channel containing the message. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: include_labels
options.description: Whether to include labels for each ID in custom profile fields

options.name: user
options.description: User to retrieve profile info for

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

userIds.name: userIds
userIds.description: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
userIds.ai_hint: The ID of the user to invite into channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
userId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: channelId
options.description: Channel containing the file to be listed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: showFilesHidden
options.description: Whether to show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit

options.name: tsFrom
options.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: tsTo
options.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: types
options.description: Filter files by type

options.name: userId
options.description: Filter files created by a single user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource.

options.name: options
options.description: Other options to set

options.name: channelIds
options.description: The channels to send the file to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: fileName
options.description: Filename of file

options.name: initialComment
options.description: The message text introducing the file in specified channels

options.name: threadTs
options.description: Provide another message's ts value to upload this file as a reply. Never use a reply's ts value; use its parent instead.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of file

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

name.name: name
name.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.
name.ai_hint: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

ts.name: ts
ts.description: Timestamp of the message to be updated
ts.ai_hint: Timestamp of the message to be updated

topic.name: topic
topic.description: The new topic string. Does not support formatting or linkification.
topic.ai_hint: The new topic string. Does not support formatting or linkification.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to send the message to
channel.ai_hint: The channel to send the message to

user.name: user
user.description: The ID of the user to get the online status of
user.ai_hint: The ID of the user to get the online status of

text.name: text
text.description: New text for the message, using the default formatting rules. It's not required when presenting attachments.
text.ai_hint: New text for the message, using the default formatting rules. It's not required when presenting attachments.

otherOptions.name: otherOptions

options.name: icon_emoji
options.description: Emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.

options.name: icon_url
options.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message

options.name: link_names
options.description: Whether to find and link channel names and usernames

options.name: thread_ts
options.description: Provide another message's ts value to make this message a reply

options.name: mrkdwn
options.description: Whether to use Slack Markdown parsing

options.name: reply_broadcast
options.description: Whether the reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation. Use in conjunction with thread_ts.

options.name: unfurl_links
options.description: Whether to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content

options.name: unfurl_media
options.description: Whether to disable unfurling of media content

options.name: sendAsUser
options.description: The message will be sent from this username (i.e. as if this individual sent the message).

otherOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

attachments.name: attachments

options.name: fallback
options.description: Required plain-text summary of the attachment

options.name: text
options.description: Text to send

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the message

options.name: title_link
options.description: Link of the title

options.name: color
options.description: Color of the line left of text

options.name: pretext
options.description: Text which appears before the message block

options.name: author_name
options.description: Name that should appear

options.name: author_link
options.description: Link for the author

options.name: author_icon
options.description: Icon which should appear for the user

options.name: image_url
options.description: URL of image

options.name: thumb_url
options.description: URL of thumbnail

options.name: footer
options.description: Text of footer to add

options.name: footer_icon
options.description: Icon which should appear next to footer

options.name: ts
options.description: Time message relates to

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to add to message

values.name: title
values.description: Title of the item

values.name: value
values.description: Value of the item

values.name: short
values.description: Whether items can be displayed next to each other

attachments.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: channels
options.description: A comma-separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: description
options.description: A short description of the User Group

options.name: handle
options.description: A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.

options.name: include_count
options.description: Whether to include the number of users in each User Group

options.name: name
options.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

blocksUi.name: blocksUi

values.name: blockId
values.description: A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

values.name: type
values.description: The type of element

values.name: text
values.description: The text for the block

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format

values.name: actionId
values.description: An identifier for this action. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids used elsewhere by your app.

values.name: url
values.description: A URL to load in the user's browser when the button is clicked. Maximum length for this field is 3000 characters. If you're using URL, you'll still receive an interaction payload and will need to send an acknowledgement response.

values.name: value
values.description: The value to send along with the interaction payload

values.name: style
values.description: Decorates buttons with alternative visual color schemes

values.name: confirmUi
titleUi
text
values.description: Text of the title

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format
Defines the dialog's title

values.name: textUi
text
values.description: The text for the block

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format
Defines the explanatory text that appears in the confirm dialog

values.name: confirmTextUi
text
values.description: Defines the explanatory text that appears in the confirm dialog

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format
Defines the text of the button that confirms the action

values.name: denyUi
text
values.description: Defines the text of the button that cancels the action

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format
Defines the text of the button that cancels the action

values.name: style
values.description: Defines the color scheme applied to the confirm button
Defines an optional confirmation dialog after the button is clicked

values.name: blockId
values.description: A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

values.name: textUi
type
values.description: The formatting to use for this text object

values.name: text
values.description: The text for the block. This field accepts any of the standard text formatting markup when type is mrkdwn.

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format. This field is only usable when type is plain_text.

values.name: verbatim
values.description: Whether to set to false (as is default) URLs will be auto-converted into links, conversation names will be link-ified, and certain mentions will be automatically parsed
Define the text of the button that cancels the action

values.name: fieldsUi
type
values.description: The formatting to use for this text object

values.name: text
values.description: The text for the block. This field accepts any of the standard text formatting markup when type is mrkdwn.

values.name: emoji
values.description: Whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format. This field is only usable when type is plain_text.

values.name: verbatim
values.description: When set to false (as is default) URLs will be auto-converted into links, conversation names will be link-ified, and certain mentions will be automatically parsed
An array of text objects. Any text objects included with fields will be rendered in a compact format that allows for 2 columns of side-by-side text. Maximum number of items is 10.

blocksUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.ai_hint: The text content of the file to upload

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

userGroupId.name: userGroupId
userGroupId.description: The encoded ID of the User Group to update
userGroupId.ai_hint: The encoded ID of the User Group to update

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'archive' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'close' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'userIds'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'kick' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'kick' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'join' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'history' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'leave' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'member' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'member' AND resource == 'channel' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveData'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'open' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'replies' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'replies' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'ts'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'setPurpose' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'setPurpose' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'purpose'
IF operation == 'setTopic' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'setTopic' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'topic'
IF operation == 'unarchive' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getPermalink' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getPermalink' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF operation IN ["post", "postEphemeral"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'channel'
IF operation == 'postEphemeral' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF operation IN ["post", "postEphemeral"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation IN ["post", "postEphemeral"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF operation IN ["post", "postEphemeral"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'otherOptions'
IF /authentication == 'accessToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendAsUser'
IF operation IN ["post", "postEphemeral"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachments'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'ts'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsJson'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'blocksJson'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'blocksUi'
IF type == 'actions' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF type == 'actions' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementsUi'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'emoji'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'actionId'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'style'
IF type == 'section' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF type == 'section' THEN SHOW parameter 'textUi'
IF type == 'plainText' THEN SHOW parameter 'emoji'
IF type == 'mrkwdn' THEN SHOW parameter 'verbatim'
IF type == 'section' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF type == 'section' THEN SHOW parameter 'accessoryUi'
IF type == 'button' THEN SHOW parameter 'confirmUi'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'post' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsJson'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'post' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'blocksJson'
IF jsonParameters == False AND operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachments'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'reaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "get", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "get", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'info' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getPresence' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'disable' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'disable' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'enable' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'enable' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'userProfile' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'userProfile' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'userProfile' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
